name: Songs.Attributes
desc: The attributes for a song resource.

items.name: albumName
items.desc: The name of the album the song appears on.

items.name: artistName
items.desc: The artist’s name.

items.name: artwork
items.desc: The album artwork.

items.name: attribution
items.desc: (Classical music only) The name of the artist or composer to attribute the song with.

items.name: composerName
items.desc: The song’s composer.

items.name: contentRating
items.desc: The Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA) rating of the content. The possible values for this rating are clean and explicit. No value means no rating.

items.name: discNumber
items.desc: The disc number of the album the song appears on.

items.name: durationInMillis
items.desc: The duration of the song in milliseconds.

items.name: editorialNotes
items.desc: The notes about the song that appear in the Apple Music catalog.

items.name: genreNames
items.desc: The genre names the song is associated with.

items.name: hasLyrics
items.desc: Indicates if the song has lyrics available in the Apple Music catalog. If true, the song has lyrics available; otherwise, it does not.

items.name: isrc
items.desc: The International Standard Recording Code (ISRC) for the song.

items.name: movementCount
items.desc: (Classical music only) The movement count of this song.

items.name: movementName
items.desc: (Classical music only) The movement name of this song.

items.name: movementNumber
items.desc: (Classical music only) The movement number of this song.

items.name: name
items.desc: The localized name of the song.

items.name: playParams
items.desc: The parameters to use to playback the song.

items.name: previews
items.desc: The preview assets for the song.

items.name: releaseDate
items.desc: The release date of the song, when known, in YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY format. Pre-release songs may have an expected release date in the future.

items.name: trackNumber
items.desc: The number of the song in the album’s track list.

items.name: url
items.desc: The URL for sharing the song in Apple Music.

items.name: workName
items.desc: (Classical music only) The name of the associated work.

items.name: artistUrl
items.desc: The url of the artist for this content.
